title: RBI wins 'Risk Manager of the Year' award by London's Central Banking publication
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has been awarded the "Risk Manager of the Year Award 2024" by Central Banking, London, for enhancing its risk culture and its pivotal role in ensuring financial stability in India. RBI's Executive Director, Shri Manoranjan Mishra, accepted the award at a ceremony in London. He highlighted the institution's rigorous risk management approach in navigating India's financial landscape.
